name: Marry Me, Misato!
description:
"affection"

In Marry Me, Misato! The hero, whose only love is Misato decides to marry her. But it's obvious – she is an anime character, how can he marry her then? However, his love is so strong… And he has a plan...

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2005-01-01. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The engine was created by Jet. Estimated completion time is 30 minutes .

Marry Me, Misato! is game Nr. 4 of the Original 22.
